<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Springing Leaper](/Feats.aspx?ID=5555) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps. You can [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=2298) as a 2-action activity to double the distance you can Leap vertically, or Leap as a 3-action activity to triple the distance you can Leap vertically. You don't automatically fail [Long Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378) for jumping in a different direction than your Stride.
name: Springing Leaper
